narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mercy Life Center Corporation is a Clinic/Center  Community Health provider based in Pittsburgh, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $68.5M in Medicaid payments across 491K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $68.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
